# kAudioUnitSubType_VoiceProcessingIO

**Global Variable**

An audio unit that interfaces to the audio inputs and outputs of iOS devices and provides voice processing features.

## Declaration

```swift
var kAudioUnitSubType_VoiceProcessingIO: UInt32 { get }
```

## Discussion

Bus 0 provides output to hardware and bus 1 accepts input from hardware. See [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/audio-unit-voice-i-o] for the identifiers for this audio unit’s properties.

## Constants

- **kAudioUnitSubType_GenericOutput**
title: kAudioUnitSubType_VoiceProcessingIO
